bastion
*******


Description
===========

Use the Bastion CLI to provide restricted and time-limited access to
target resources that donâ€™t have public endpoints. Bastions let
authorized users connect from specific IP addresses to target
resources using Secure Shell (SSH) sessions. For more information, see
the Bastion documentation.


Available Commands
==================

* bastion

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* session

  * create

  * create-managed-ssh

  * create-port-forwarding

  * create-session-create-dynamic-port-forwarding-session-target-
    resource-details

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list-work-request-logs
